005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util.ModuleUtils;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
013
014/**
015 * A base class for a flag that is a member of a containing model.
016 *
017 * @param <PARENT>
018 *          the Java type of the parent model (i.e., assembly, field).
019 * @param <DEFINITION>
020 *          the Java type of the definition for this member flag
021 * @param <INSTANCE>
022 *          the Java type of the instance for this member flag
023 */
024public abstract class AbstractFlagInstance<
025    PARENT extends IModelDefinition,
026    DEFINITION extends IFlagDefinition,
027    INSTANCE extends IFlagInstance>
028    extends AbstractNamedInstance<PARENT>
029    implements IFlagInstance {
030  /**
031   * Construct a new flag instance.
032   *
033   * @param parent
034   *          the parent model containing this instance
035   */
036  protected AbstractFlagInstance(@NonNull PARENT parent) {
037    super(parent, name -> ModuleUtils.parseFlagName(parent.getContainingModule(), name));
038  }
039
040  @Override
041  public DEFINITION getDefinition() {
042    IEnhancedQName qname = getReferencedDefinitionQName();
043    // this should always be not null
044    IFlagDefinition definition = getContainingModule().getScopedFlagDefinitionByName(qname);
045    if (definition == null) {
046      throw new ModelInitializationException(
047          String.format("Unable to resolve field reference '%s' in definition '%s' in module '%s'",
048              qname,
049              getContainingDefinition().getName(),
050              getContainingModule().getShortName()));
051    }
052    return ObjectUtils.asType(definition);
053  }
054
055  @Override
056  public final PARENT getContainingDefinition() {
057    return getParentContainer();
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Generates a "coordinate" string for the assembly instance.
062   *
063   * @return the coordinate
064   */
065  @SuppressWarnings("null")
066  @Override
067  public String toCoordinates() {
068    IDefinition definition = getDefinition();
069    return String.format("flag instance %s -> %s in module %s (@%d(%d)",
070        getQName(),
071        definition.getDefinitionQName(),
072        getContainingDefinition().getContainingModule().getShortName(),
073        hashCode(),
074        definition.hashCode());
075  }
076
077  @Override
078  public IModule getContainingModule() {
079    return getContainingDefinition().getContainingModule();
080  }
081}
